Talon:

Talon looked from the distance the new comer, altough something cha=
nged it was Tucson; she smiled in a enigmatic way and walking foward she sa=
id "i warned you, nightstrike would be hard to make him confess something"
=


From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, March 29, 2010 9:38 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
While home =
at the old Maximal Base, Quickstride and Rat Trap see it wise to keep an ey=
e on what is happening outside the base, while keeping things casual amongs=
t themselves. Rat Trap looks up at the sky, and notices the minions hanging=
 about, yet he does not make any moves against them.

" I'll sure be glad w=
hen we get these creeps off our backs."

Quick Stride plucks at a few blade=
s of grass and swallows a mouth full.

" I hear ya."

While eating he spots=
 a pair of headlights, and a sizeable silver truck, with black bumpers, loo=
king a lot like the Autobot he had just helped to rescue recently. He nudge=
s Rat Trap.

"What? What is it?"

Quick Stride points to the truck with his=
 nose.

" Over there, coming toward us. That truck, it looks familliar."

R=
at Trap spots Tucson Prime heading toward them. His little jaw drops.

" Ho=
ly Primus, I was right! I was right! Hah, it's Wheels! And wow! Has he chan=
ged!"

Quick Stride and Rat Trap get into their robot modes and jump around=
 happilly. Tucson Prime sees their reception while approaching. As he gets =
close enough to them he transforms into robot mode and looks to them. Rat T=
rap walks up to him with a smile and tears actually welling up in his eyes.=


" Wow, look at ya. Ya sure made a change for the best.. Er, Tucson Prime.=
"

Tucson smiles.

"I like the other name better."

Rat Trap looks up.

"Um=
, Tucson?"

Tucson chuckles.

"No, the other one."

Rat Trap smiles.

"Whee=
ls?"

Tucson nodds.

"Yeah, that one."

Rat Trap quickly goes up to his fri=
end, as they exchange an embrace.

"It's great ta see ya again Wheels. And =
contrats on your promotion."

Tucson's expression does not change. His smil=
e as gentile as that of a common Autobot.

"Thank you. First I have to live=
 up to my new status. And I wouldn't have been able to do that if you hadn'=
t rescued me like you did."

Rat Trap was in his glory.

"Aww, what are fri=
ends for? Okay, so, what brings ya here? And, you're lookn' ta me now.."

T=
ucson kneels down to Rat Trap.

" First, When I got transformed, the energy=
 managed to repair the damage to my optics. Second, I came here to talk to =
Nightstrike."

Rat Trap points to the base.

"Oh, um, ya better check in wi=
th the guys in the base first. Although, it's kinda obivous that you're one=
 of us.. More so now."

Tucson chuckles again, and walks up toward the base=
.

" Legacy, this is Tucson Prime reporting back to the Maximal Base. I wis=
h to talk to Nightstrike, if at all possible. Please inform Lord Perseus of=
 my pressense, it's important that I converse with him also."

ars that the minions have left." Perseus said into the radio.
> "Although t=
hey are our enemy, we can't afford a fight right now. Team,
> let's secure =
the rest of the base. We don't want any surprises."
> 
> Ravenchief returne=
d to the group and they began walking down into the base.
> The area was mu=
ch easier to navigate now that the lights were on, however
> the place was =
still somewhat dark and gloomy.
> 
> 
> On Mar 25, 2010 5:25 PM, "Preston C=
arroll" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
> 
> Legacy continued for a moment, exam=
ining the strange scans from
> Marauder, his single optic pulsing as he wat=
ched the information
> scroll across his screen.
> 
> "Lord Perseus." Legac=
y intoned over the Maximal frequency, "What is to
> be the disposition of t=
he other Minion that we still have in custody.
> No doubt at some point Mar=
auder will return to reacquire his soldier."
>
